review_data.title: Excellent Indian food in Zurich
review_data.content: After two weeks of traveling around Europe with my parents, we were desperate for an authentic Indian meal. Maharani was just what the doctor ordered. The owner was very friendly, we really enjoyed the food and the decor was really unique and cool. Highly recommend!
